text: Egha Elaija uabɨra gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn aruer vamɨran an zui. A ghua temer muziarir mam batogha, an povimɨn aperagha aremeghasa God ko mɨgei. Egha ghaze, “O Ikiavɨra Itir God, osɨmtɨzir na bativir kaba da kamaghɨra tugh, nɨ na inightɨ kɨ ovegh mangam. Kɨ gumazir aghuim puvatɨ, nan ovaviba ovengezɨ moghɨn, kɨ ovengam. Kamaghɨn nɨ datɨrɨghɨn na ateghtɨ kɨ aremeka.”
